pkgmetadata.longdescription: Classes and Methods for Spatial Data // Classes and methods for spatial data; the classes document where the spatial location information resides, for 2D or 3D data. Utility functions are provided, e.g. for plotting data as maps, spatial selection, as well as methods for retrieving coordinates, for subsetting, print, summary, etc. From this version, 'rgdal', 'maptools', and 'rgeos' are no longer used at all, see https://r-spatial.org/r/2023/05/15/evolution4.html for details.
